text: Mkhawnga ami jah ngaih Jakuk, Pita la Johan naw, Pamhnam naw ahina khutbi kei 체ng pi na peki ti ngsingsaki he. Acunakyase kami van kami kh체i hmaihki ti msingnak vaia Banabah la kei jah hnuksetki he. Banabah la kei khyangmj체kce he ksunga khutbi pawh ning se amimi cun Judah he ksunga khutbi pawh khai hea kami mkhy채pki.
